channel.title: Static Animation #2
channel.description:
Hey, ive noticed that my Static Animation, always face south.. Like my dds spec, the animation always goes to the south of the player, not the way they are facing.
Anyone know a fix?
Much apreciated
--
Please no posts, like "make it hit the player/npc using coords" "i have this problem aswell!" "i dont think u can fix it"
You can fix it, because ive seen it on servers.. Please sum1?

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:11, topic:152659”]i still don’t understand why you want the special to follow the player don’t you want it to hit and then dissappear what good is a special that just follows you

					staticAnimation(441,absX,absY, 100);

is that the code base you are using?[/quote]

Your not getting my point… Every time i spec, if im facing north, the staticAnimation, from the spec weapon, goes to the south, so the special goes behind me, instead of the way im facing… Or the player im attacking. I do want it to disappear, but i want it to go infront of me, instead of behind me…

Anyone else? Please

Read full topic

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i still don’t understand why you want the special to follow the player don’t you want it to hit and then dissappear what good is a special that just follows you

					staticAnimation(441,absX,absY, 100);

is that the code base you are using?

why would you want the special to follow the player they aren’t gonna run away from

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I DONT USE THE METHOD “STILLGFX”

I use my own… Geez, how hard can that be to understand?..

You`d have to get it to where the special would follow the player.

Gah, explain how?

Read full topic

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @Dr3w Dr3w
item.description:
@Dr3w wrote:

Exactly. You`d have to get it to where the special would follow the player. But still would be a stillGFX because if it wasnt it would be stated as a projectile. Please if this doesnt make sence ask questions.

Read full topic

item.description:

what GFX do you use then because they all work as still GFX except range and projectiles so a DDS would be a stillGFX

are you on about doing specials still? becaused that is generally a stillGFX and enemy X2 and Y2 and used for things like Ice barrage

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

EnemyY2, and EnemyX2, are NPC. And, stillgfx(int, int, int)… Does nothing for me… stillgfx is lame…

And most servers DO NOT have it. I havent seen more than 3 servers, on the whole of codefasga list. That have this feature.

Read full topic

item.title: Static Animation #2
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

stillgfx(*GFX ID GOES HERE*, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); You just need EnemyY2 and EnemyX2 pre-defined which most servers have

Read full topic
